website_summaries.verdict: Dramatically lighter than playground balls, these kid-friendly balls are loved by children and adults alike.
pros: Tactile, making them good for gripping
These kid-friendly balls are dramatically lighter than playground balls and eliminate sting from getting hit
cons: May not meet official size standards for your dodgeball league, so check carefully before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Not everyone likes balls flying at their head
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t like balls flying at their head? At least when one of these balls connects with your chin it’s soft and squishy, the impact is subtle and delightful. I recommend these balls to anyone looking for a good time, go ahead stand your ground and take one of these off the chin, you won’t regret the refreshing feeling you get when you experience how much cushion they have.
customer_reviews.author: Weekendrockstars

customer_reviews.title: My Greyhounds Love Them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best balls I've ever found for my pack of 5 rescue greyhounds. They've destroyed all others so quickly, beach balls and regular store rubber balls don't last minutes, full blown soccer balls have had they leather on the outside eventually torn off... these have been in the backyard, chased carried, bounced off their noses and in general abused hard for 1 month... no rips, no tears, no errors.... They play with them in only a supervised situation for fear of finally tearing one open and eating the foam inside... but wow - they haven't even got one tooth mark in them, yet. Double coat them and market them as dog toys.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Foam Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality foam. The foam shrinks causing the gator skin to become very loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Lightweight ball.
customer_reviews.text: These are super fun for kids to do exercises with or for just playing/rolling balls on floor to improve hand-eye coordination. Also very easy for small hands to grip. They are very lightweight which is probably why they cost more. They seemed pricey at $8 per ball and you need to buy a total quantity of 6 in the package. I would have liked just to buy 3 or 4 at most. I do see that same product is used in children "gyms" and obviously they need higher quantities for all the children. They seem very durable so hopefully they will last a long time if we keep them inside or on grass surface outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as an early Christmas present for my family and we played dodgeball on Thanksgiving with them. The absolute best thing about them is that it's nearly impossible to get hurt with them. My nieces are all 4 and under, and they wandered around during the game and we didn't have to worry about them at all. If you're playing with more competitive people, you might want a ball that weighs a little more so it flies faster, but we had a great time and I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: No Pain and Lots of Game
customer_reviews.text: lol. you can go all out in trying to peg someone with one of these and they do not hurt. they have enough heft to be able to give it a good throw, but are lightweight enough that the impact does not hurt. when the kids in the neighborhood come over we have an age range of 2-adults with the moms and dads getting in on the fun and so far the only tears have been from not having enough balls to go around and not from getting hit in the face with one.
customer_reviews.author: Urduja

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: One of the other teachers had a set of these and it looked like a really fun game that wouldn’t hurt as much as getting hit by a regular red rubber ball. My kids have loved playing with them at recess and lunch. They’re small enough to get their hand around and light enough that they don’t knock you out when they hit you.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Kids and Adults having a BLAST!
customer_reviews.text: Kids to Adults used these balls for dodgeball. They have even been in the pool quite often and still holding up well. You can easily grab the ball with one hand (both kids and adults) and throw them. Very squishy and doesn't hurt. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: beanie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls are very durable, the only problem with these balls would be their weight. I have the same balls that are a different brand and they are a little heavier and fly better for dodgeball. These are good for kids in the 6-12 range as they are small enough to grip and you can't throw them too hard.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Used for Glow in the Dark Dodgeball - Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a glow in the dark dodgeball event i held at my Karate School. I made sure to move all of the "breakable" objects around but overall these worked out perfectly. They are soft when they make contact but hard enough that you can get a good throw in. I highly recommend these for events like that especially indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Best dodgeballs out there
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the quick delivery. My dodgeball league got bigger than anticipated so I needed more balls, and fast. They came exactly as described. I only wish the options like the glow in the dark version or metallic versions were more close to the price of these cause that would really take the games to the next level in terms of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Neiswanger

customer_reviews.title: Basement Dodge Ball will never be the same!!!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic balls for family games (probably at schools, Y's, camps, etc as well). they have a rubberized coating that gives them a great feel and awesome Tossibility, but they have a soft foam core that doesn't hurt! accidental head shots cause no tears in my house, which is somewhat unheard of before!!! would buy again and again these balls are great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for catch with old fingers
customer_reviews.text: My fingers took some abuse in my youth and are sensitive to hits. I ordered these balls to play casual catch games with my kids and they are great. I don't think they'll hold up if the dogs get them, but otherwise they seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dana N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Abused and loved by students in my school
customer_reviews.text: They've held up for most of a year but admittedly my kids are pretty hard on them. Edit: These have lasted three years before I replaced them with an identical set. My junior high students use them really hard but still these bags have held up amazingly well. They're not cheap but they are with the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beachy

customer_reviews.title: Too light, slippery cover, get the Franklin dodgeballs instead
customer_reviews.text: These are way too light. I have a bunch of Franklin dodgeballs and those are far superior they have a softer cover and squisher and heavier so they can actually be thrown with some velocity. These balls are too light and aren't squishy. Wish I had returned them.
customer_reviews.author: ReasonableExpectations

customer_reviews.title: Safety first and amazing game play!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing they are VERY pricey but totally worth it! Teenagers can be really hard on well everything.... And these balls most importantly protected the players and secondly protected everything else. Before we got these doors and lights had been destroyed during dodgeball and now we can play with no fear! I want more! (Just wish they were cheaper...) Overall amazing purchase if teens are playing!
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Better than traditional dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: We used these at church camp and they were fantastic! Much better than traditional dodge balls in my opinion, with less injuries due to the lighter weight and softer material. Kids loved them. Sturdy and easy to throw. We liked them so much, I bought this set for our own youth group.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Super fun around the house. Hard to actually cause damage as they are light weight. Would definitely buy again and recommend. Already have friends that have bought them and they love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: ktb

customer_reviews.title: Great dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: Great dodge balls and my son loves them. We bought some from Walmart that are a different brand and he liked these ones better. They are a little pricey for some foam balls though. Would be nice if they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Hook

customer_reviews.title: Hurl a marshmallow for Dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: I use these for dodgeball. I call it throwing Marshmallows. Fun and doesn’t hurt. They can be thrown pretty hard when used with Softball players. Creates great fun and laughs. We’ve used at least 6 times and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Keri W

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: These expensive little balls are awesome for our indoor dodgeball. You can get a great grip on them and let it rip - but the recipient will not feel a sting from the peg. This is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ItsInTheDetails

customer_reviews.title: Best balls for Dodgeball!
customer_reviews.text: I love to use these ball to play dodge balls. Even if it hits you on the face, it doesn't hurt. My students love to play with these and I never see them crying. So light and very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: lucky mom

customer_reviews.title: Dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Just wish they didn’t cost so much for so little of balls. But they worked great and my students loved them!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Effin’ A Cotton!
customer_reviews.text: “If you can dodge a wrench you can dodge a ball! “ Kids love them. High quality. Not as cool as the old school kick ball kind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in Texas

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these to my nephews at a big Christmas get together and they were the favorite gift of all! Straight to the basement for a big dodgeball tournament for 7-50 year olds!! Way softer than rubber playground balls and don't hurt like them either. Can grip nicely with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: hyyn

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends love the dodge balls. However, I think $38 is a ridiculous price for what you get, even though I keep buying them for the convenience factor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment much on the durability since we haven’t had them long, but the kids love them. They do sting a little if you are a no athletic always hated dodgeball kind of mom.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Lab Retriever who loves to play ball indoors. Don't need to worry about breaking things kicking the ball around the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: Great balls much cheaper than going to the local store.
customer_reviews.text: Great little dodgeballs they were the best price I could find at the time. They are regulation size. Worked great for practice since these types of ball do not seem to go straight.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these dodgeballs for my middle school PE class. We’ve only used them a few times but they are perfect for that purpose. They are lightweight and don’t hurt when they hit someone, yet they are easy to aim and throw accurately. Hopefully they will hold up throughout the coming school year.
customer_reviews.author: MomK

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids of all ages. Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these balls to play GAGA ball with summer camp. The balls are soft enough for kids of all ages to enjoy. They are great for dodge ball, and a safer alternative to the large rubber balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! My family loves playing dodge ball with these. You can throw hard and they don't hurt too much.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Milton

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Students say they go to the right when thrown. Less complaining once they got used to them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: These balls are amazing. My 1 year old received these as a Christmas gift cuz he loves balls and we were trying to find something he can't eat. Well 1 month in and he hasn't been able to eat them, and my children throw them at each other and they don't hurt at all.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good for indoors
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Especially if you have the room indoors. Kids are moving and have an inside game to play with instead of just video games.
customer_reviews.author: Clos

customer_reviews.title: Stop! These are $165 from Gopher.
customer_reviews.text: I personally convinced our school district to add Amazon because of your low prices.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BALLS
customer_reviews.text: We use thes balls in our AWANA games. They do not sting if thrown hard. Especially in dodge ball
customer_reviews.author: dale f simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dodgeball!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for dodgeball, good weight for throwing, but soft on the hit so no one gets hurt! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: More durable than dodge balls and 4 times less expensive than other dodge balls we own.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2jc

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! Our kids play them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Playing with Your Kids
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were just for "softies" , but they are great for letting everyone get in the game. (How else can I play dodgeball with my 7 year old and 10-year old). #iwouldtakeadodgeballforyou
customer_reviews.author: Wade Galt

customer_reviews.title: These are pre school and elementary school sized balls
customer_reviews.text: Nice but small. Middle school and up will want bigger 7" sized balls. I returned these and order the 7" for our middle and high school age youth.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Schloss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6th graders
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these at least once per week with my 6th graders. No one gets hurt, the balls are durable, and the students love them. I’ve had some teachers complain they are too hard to catch, but the kids don’t seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for all ages. Just returned from a family vacation and played dodgeball everyday. 70 to 5 and all loved it. You can get hit flush in the face with a fast ball and not get hurt - might scare you a little, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: marsally

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these since price was good and they are amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are some fabulous dodgeballs. Was in a bind since the ones we had at my school were all messed up, I ordered these since price was good and they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: Gators are Great!
customer_reviews.text: They were great. My family from ages 4-68 loved them and we had a fun time playing games with the "Gators"!
customer_reviews.author: T4bach

customer_reviews.title: Best find for playground balls
customer_reviews.text: This was the best deal I could find and the kids love them on the playground!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Emery

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for playing dodgeball. They are acutally a little too small and too light weight. For the amount of money spent I was disappointed and should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dodgeball: the social distancing game of the summer.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grip, easy to throw with good weight, but surprising not painful even with head shots. One got run over by a car, it survived, but has a slight crack in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs too!! Especially puppies 💗
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for our dog! She loves playing ball and because there is foam inside they do not deflate! She can get them with her puppy teeth and carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: They work for our purposes but. Maybe too light. They curve when thrown
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome family fun! Small kids to little kids yes...even adults I would recommend having small flat cone makers as boundaries
customer_reviews.author: R. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: They stand up!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice even with HARD use in a k-5 school
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: They do not hurt if you get hit by the ball - great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Balls are just the right size for anyone playing this game. They do not hurt if you get hit by the ball - great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Watts

customer_reviews.title: Good for adults and kids alike!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of backyard fun - worth the money to get balls that don't hurt kids!
customer_reviews.author: Bsymom

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for. We use them ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. We use them in the basement for dodgeball. Foam interior with a 'gator skin' as described. No drywall damage or markings when we play. ;)
customer_reviews.author: AmericanDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Kids Love
customer_reviews.text: Great product, our kids enjoy playing dodgeball in neighborhood. This are the same balls used at their school.
customer_reviews.author: Thompske

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So fun! Size is perfect for toddlers to pick up and throw.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa A

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't just for dodge ball. Great for learning how to catch, super soft and can play with in the house !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, kids love them. Durability seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sakar

customer_reviews.title: Too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These look like real gator dodgeballs but they are really light , which makes them hard to throw farther distance. They are okay but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Berdalou

customer_reviews.title: Great dodgeballs!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Great indoor activity for a winter in MN.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Dodgeballs!
customer_reviews.text: My son was very specific with the type of dodgeballs he wanted for his party. These dodgeballs not only met his expectations but exceeded them! Great quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 (12 balls) and it is worth the money. The balls were exactly as I expected. They were perfect. The only thing you will need to get is a bag to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gym ball, not good for dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball but I do not recommend for dodgeball, they are slightly small and too light.
customer_reviews.author: Verts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought 30 for school P.E. program. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Good dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: They are nice quality dodge balls. A little lightweight but otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dodge ball! We use them for elementary school kids.
customer_reviews.author: happy to contribute

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as expected and they have held up very well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beau Detrick

customer_reviews.title: My kids in school love it. Safe for playing
customer_reviews.text: My kids in school love it. Safe for playing, you don;t have to worry if someone gets hit by ball.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Samson

customer_reviews.title: The kids like them as they don't hurt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my P.E. class. After almost a year of use by multiple classes they are holding up well. The kids like them as they don't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: tiger76

customer_reviews.title: Great for games
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We use them for a summer camp and they hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 13 kids in my classroom and almost every last one of them wanted one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: perfect type of ball for the class I was teaching
customer_reviews.author: MJ1024

customer_reviews.title: Kids had a great time with them.
customer_reviews.text: Birthday party for age 12-13 year olds. Had it in a gym and the kids had a blast
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Fondren

customer_reviews.title: Great for Indoor Use
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun to use especially indoors during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Pjlaxcoach

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends live playing with these dodgeballs!!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Canines may like these too
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these balls - and he has not (yet) been able to tear/shred the very tough skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rusti Baker

customer_reviews.title: Gator Skin Dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons, ages 7 and 10, have received these for other Christmas gifts in the past. They would last longer, but their German Shepherd loves them and chews them up in his excitement. We have to replace them periodically. They are very nice balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These balls are a royal rip-off. Royal because they ...
customer_reviews.text: These balls are a royal rip-off. Royal because they are so expensive. Rip-off because they are not as advertised. "Answers to questions" states that the balls are 6 inches in diameter. Not even close on any measuring device! Cute little kids toys, but $50?
customer_reviews.author: Chenry

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times.
customer_reviews.text: Great for playing with kids. You can grip it, but no matter how hard you throw it, it won't hurt - even if it is a face shot.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Gir

customer_reviews.title: Very stong like they said they would be
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I wanted the grandkids love them
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Saving Our Faces.
customer_reviews.text: We've used them before. They save our faces! Adding colored balls made more options for the game! The balls are easy to grip and don't kill you when you're smacked in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Malone

customer_reviews.title: Made the Phys Ed teacher happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Physical Education Teacher who had let us borrow his gator balls for several years for a Boys & Girls Club. I know he appreciated us buying him some as the wear and tear on gator balls means losing a few each year. He was a happy camper, so I am too! Thanks for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Jo Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great colors. I ordered these because the system wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. I ordered these because the system wouldn't allow me to order enough of the rhino balls. Glad I did, because they were cheaper and seem to be these same balls, just with a different label. Used as a fun activity during birthday party then sent the balls home with the guests as a party favor.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly disappointed. We had ordered these for my son's birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed. We had ordered these for my son's birthday party to have a dodgeball tournament. We paid $55+ for the pack of 6 and they were 2.5" not the size that was indicated. Looked like nothing for the price that we paid.
customer_reviews.author: DanS

product_meta.title: S&S Worldwide Gator Skin Dodgeballs (Set of 6)
product_meta.description: Our best-selling Gator Skin Dodgeballs in an exciting 6-color set! Bright 6"-diameter dodgeballs feature a soft, 25kg-per-meter cube foam density. Our kid-friendly balls are dramatically lighter than other playground balls and virtually eliminate the sting associated with getting hit by the ball. They weigh less than 20% of a traditional 8-1/2" rubber playground ball often used to play dodgeball. An ideal dodgeball for kids ages 4 to 8. Certified Latex Free. Non-sting coating is a proprietary polyurethane. The tactile, non-sting coating makes them easy to grip, and the coating is so durable, they're virtually tear-proof! No more red marks from the stinging hit of a vinyl- coated or rubber ball, so everyone can play at ease and gain confidence. That means more fun during more activities. Our premium Gator Skin balls are simply your BEST choice. Gator Skin is a registered trademark of S&S Worldwide. Any use of this trademark without express written consent from S&S Worldwide is strictly prohibited. Gator Skin is the original coated foam ball enjoyed by millions of satisfied customers.
feature_bullets: BEST SELLING PACK OF DODGEBALLS: One set of six 6” dodgeballs that come in a variety of bright colors including blue, yellow, orange, red, green, and purple
NO STING! SOFT FOAM CONSTRUCTION: No more tears from stinging hits! Allows everyone to get in on the action!
DURABLE AND VIRTUALLY TEAR-PROOF: The fun won’t be interrupted by a torn or popped ball, as Gator Skin dodgeballs are made to last and require no inflation
LIGHT AND EASY TO GRIP: Each foam ball weighs 120 grams and is surrounded by a tactile, non-sting coating that makes them easy to grip for even the smallest hands!

PERFECT FOR TONS OF PHYSICAL ACTIVITY GAMES: Whether it’s PE Class, Camp or a Birthday Party, Gator Skin is the safest way to play dodgeball! It’s great for throwing, catching, target and parachute games!
